content: The attribute MedicationKnowledge.relatedMedicationKnowledge.type is the type of the target product or the type of the relation? (I'm not sure if I asked before. I'm looking at the latter, (the former is available from the target itself), but if I don't need an extension, that's better.
That helps, thanks. Is it worth it to clarify the language in the element definition?
we have an existing issue to update the element definitions.
